formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the config which holds all the connection information. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: Bucket Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the Bucket to create

formElement.label: Folder Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the Folder/Prefix to lists

formElement.label: List Objects in this folder or Include all sub folders:
formElement.documentation: If checked, All objects in this folder and all sub folders will be listed.

formElement.label: Results Location:
formElement.documentation: Where to put the result. If not specified, the result is pushed to /myJob.
